imdb.plot outline: In this epic family drama, we meet three-step-brothers as they venture out into the world. The youngest, Jericho, decides to reconnect with his estranged father who is a best selling LGBT author. The oldest, Vince, thought he was spending his summer alone in the mountains but a childhood friend pops up along with some old emotions. And then there's the brother in the middle...Ronaldo. The brother nobody really knows about it. But please, call him Aldo.
imdb.title: Better Together
plot: In this epic family drama, we meet three-step-brothers as they venture out into the world. The youngest, Jericho, decides to reconnect with his estranged father who is a best selling LGBT author. The oldest, Vince, thought he was spending his summer alone in the mountains but a childhood friend pops up along with some old emotions. And then there's the brother in the middle...Ronaldo. The brother nobody really knows about it. But please, call him Aldo.::Tyson Anthony
